title: 3dANOVA2
description: This program performs a two-factor Analysis of Variance (ANOVA) on 3D datasets.

output_ftr.title: Output FTR File
output_ftr.description: F-statistic for treatment effect output file

output_fa.title: Output FA File
output_fa.description: F-statistic for factor A effect output file

output_fb.title: Output FB File
output_fb.description: F-statistic for factor B effect output file

output_amean.title: Output AMEAN File
output_amean.description: Estimate mean of factor A level output file

output_bmean.title: Output BMEAN File
output_bmean.description: Estimate mean of factor B level output file

output_xmean.title: Output XMEAN File
output_xmean.description: Estimate mean of cell at level i of factor A and level j of factor B output file

output_adiff.title: Output ADIFF File
output_adiff.description: Difference between levels i and j of factor A output file

output_bdiff.title: Output BDIFF File
output_bdiff.description: Difference between levels i and j of factor B output file

output_xdiff.title: Output XDIFF File
output_xdiff.description: Difference between cell mean at A=i, B=j and cell mean at A=k, B=l output file

output_acontr.title: Output ACONTR File
output_acontr.description: Contrast in factor A levels output file

output_bcontr.title: Output BCONTR File
output_bcontr.description: Contrast in factor B levels output file

output_xcontr.title: Output XCONTR File
output_xcontr.description: Contrast in cell means output file
